name: Yahtzee (itch) (Zaidis)
description:
This project is for my Independent Study where I learned to create a basic node.js networking server that allows multiple clients to play Yahtzee together! There is no MLAPI, Photon, or Mirror.

The game is Yahtzee. Roll dice up to three times and keep the combination in one of thirteen categories. Whoever has the higher score in the end, wins!
